UI components

Read about the component maturity scale

alpha

Intro text on what is included in this section and how to use it. No more than one or two sentences.

Apple pie

It's delicious.

  • 
  <div class="usa-image-block">
    <img src="/assets/img/typography_example_apple_pie.png"  alt="Apple Pie">
    <div class="usa-image-text-block">
      <h2 class="usa-display">Apple pie</h2>
      <p class="usa-image-text">It's delicious.</p>
    </div>
  </div>
